synthesis.drying_method: Degassed under ultrahigh vacuum (4 μmHg) at 100 °C for 12 h

characterization.details: PANalytical X’Pert diffractometer with Cu Kα emission radiation (λ = 0.154 nm) at a range of 8–40° (2θ) with a step size of 0.026°
Bruker Smart Apex II diffractometer with graphite-monochromated Cu Kα radiation at 173 K
Pyris 1 TGA instrument from 50 to 600 °C in N2 atmosphere at a constant rate of 10 °C/min
Micromeritics ASAP 2460 adsorption apparatus at 195 K

adsorption_measurements_and_breakthrough.sample_preparation: Degassed under ultrahigh vacuum (4 μmHg) at 100 °C for 12 h
adsorption_measurements_and_breakthrough.breakthrough_experiments_details: Binary C2H2/C2H4 and C2H4/C2H6 mixtures were carried out in a stainless steel HPLC column (1 cm I.D. × 15 cm) with 10.57 g degassed sample filled in at a constant flow rate of 1.20 mL/min at 298 K and 100 kPa

adsorption_selectivity_for_binary_mixtur.method: Ideal adsorbed solution theory (IAST) combined with the DSLF model

density_functional_theory_calculations.details: DMol3 in the Materials Studio package, GGA with PBE and DNP basis set, semi-empirical dispersion correction included
